node.name: Echo Dot Alexa Smart Speaker(3rd Gen) MAKE: AMAZON
node.description: An interacting speaker fitted with basic artifical intelligence which respond in english, hindi. Initial setup through Alexa app and Wifi, A/C is needed to make it workable while limited songs collection from sponsored websites like hungama.com & jiosaavn. (SIZE: 43 x 99 x 99mm / WEIGHT: 300 grams)
node.content: 1> Easy to change songs through vocal commands from distance up to 10-15 feet /2> Information delivery pattern is very simple to understand, in fact in most of the search it uses google algorithm  /3> It can easily pair or connect to other media devices through Bluetooth but no inbuilt battery is provided and which is the only drawback /4> Initial setup or pairing of "Alexa-device" is done through "Alexa-App" and  "WIFI" which is the very easy and step-by-step procedure /5> Just like WIFI router which runs continuously, "Alexa-device" is also never needed to shutdown /6> Best buying option for bachelors and one should need to add "Alexa" before giving any command like "Alexa -- Tell me about India"
node.alt: Echo Dot (3rd Gen) â€“ Smart speaker with Alexa (Grey)

node.name: Echo Show 5 Alexa(Display Screen) MAKE: AMAZON
node.description: With touch display feature Alexa current upgrade is my pick edition for family customers. Personalize, privacy and customize are also added in the edition with enhance sound quality. Device also enabled with online movies streaming channel like Amazon prime & Netflix. (SIZE: 140x85x75mm / WEIGHT: 415 grams / RESOLUTION: 960x480 pixels / CAMERA: 1 MP)
node.content: 1> Front display of 140x85mm which is projected capacitive touch screen and inbuilt sub-woofer sound that is perfect for home entertainment of small families /2> User can customize the home screen, personalize and save the favorite playlist and also put privacy on adult content for minors or older /3> With 1 MP camera  on the front it can also use for video calls to friends and also parents can use its drop-in feature to check on kids like an intercom /4> HD display screen that is good to watch the movies in a higher quality /5> Initial setup is partly different "Go to settings, or swipe down from the top of the screen and select Settings > Select Network > Select your Wi-Fi network and follow the prompts on the screen"
node.alt: Introducing Echo Show 5 - Smart display with Alexa - 5.5" screen & crisp sound (White)

node.name: Echo Dot Alexa Smart Speaker(4th Gen) MAKE: AMAZON
node.description: Refreshed design with LED display of clock and temperature. Improved sound quality as per price difference from 3rd Gen and additional sponsored websites apart from hungama.com & jiosaavn. (SIZE: 100x100x89mm / WEIGHT: 342 grams)
node.content: 1> Mostly with an outer update like enhance features of a clock and temperature display, and also improvement in distance vocal commands up to 20 feet /2> With an additional sponsored website, gaana.com, it is very much easy for every Bollywood or English songs request get fulfilled /3> Yes, the output audio is improved with increase quality in the bass which makes it the perfect device for house party /4> Less touch, better and bigger connect is one of the user's review and this "Alexa-device" completely stands on it /5> Initial setup or pairing is same, first  "Alexa-device" is connected through "Alexa-App" and  "WIFI" which is the very easy and step-by-step procedure /6> Best buying option for party-loving person and one should need to add "Alexa" before giving any command like "Alexa -- Play the song Memories by Maroon-5"
node.alt: All-new Echo Dot (4th Gen) with clock | Next generation smart speaker with improved bass, LED display and Alexa (White)

strapiProduct.description: Refreshed design with LED display of clock and temperature. Improved sound quality as per price difference from 3rd Gen and additional sponsored websites apart from hungama.com & jiosaavn. (SIZE: 100x100x89mm / WEIGHT: 342 grams)
